name: Lambda Project V
description:
Controls with Mouse/Keyboard and Controller (the controller does not work in the main menu)

- Movement --> WASD / Left stick

- Dash --> Left Shift / Left Button

- Attack --> Left Click and Right Click / L1 and R1

- Minimap --> TAB / Up Button

Game

You have to kill every enemy in each room, in the last one you will find a boss.

The red color damages BLUE ENEMIES

The blue color heals BLUE ENEMIES

The blue color damages RED ENEMIES

The red color heals RED ENEMIES

Hint: In order to defeat the boss you have to let him attack you and dodge its melee attack.
